return.value: extracted value on success or default value otherwise. Nothing if syntax error occurred.

array.param: index of required item in the input array.
a default value to return if input is undefined, of the wrong type or of the wrong length (if the item is an array).
checks if passed value is one of listed Data Types. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means every data type is accepted.
a single size or array of sizes. If passed input value is an array, checks that it has a certain number of elements. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means any size is accepted.

return.value: extracted value on success or default value otherwise. Nothing if syntax error occurred.

syntax.param: A usual array of params is expected. If a non-array value is passed, it will be converted to 1 element array

array.param: index of required item in the input array.
a default value to return if input is undefined, of the wrong type or of the wrong length (if the item is an array).
checks if passed value is one of listed Data Types. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means every data type is accepted.
a single size or array of sizes. If passed input value is an array, checks that it has a certain number of elements. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means any size is accepted.
